message.body: hi
Hi. Good timing. This reminds me to break for lunch :-)
How ya doing?
I'm good :) just got on my.lunch too
Tsk, tsk, what kept u? ;-) I've finished mine already, but I still have time to chat.
Sorry for the delay - I was in another bldg and the message kept getting "Send failed"
haha my lunch goes from 12ish to 1
ed, & you're all right.
My place has really loose scheduling for full-timers. Get your work done, be at meetings (not many of those either :-), be around & accessible when need
Do u go out to eat?
sounds pretty nice. what state are u in?
If it's not a good time 4 u, what wd.be?
I do go out to eat occasionally ..
my phone has crappy signal where I'm working today so it sends my messages in bunches. lol
Oy. - I usually bring my lunch. Today especially: we've got a T-storm now, and when I was out before it was SO BLASTED HOT & MUGGY!
ide. Office faces west & gets way too hot if I don't, most days.
As long as I'm inside, I'm glad of this rain. 1, it should make things cooler & less muggy on my way home tonite. 2, I can pull up my blinds to see outs
where are you located?
Philadelphia
U?
Colorado
Yeah? My wife was born in Greeley.
oh nice! I live in Aurora
Evening plans? Huh, if you do I won't read about them till tomorrow. Or maybe I will, you're on MDT and it's only 6:30 for you. Son & I just did our gro
cery shopping.
just got home from the grocery too. had to buy cleaning supplies -- bf's fam is comin into town on Thursday.. fun night of cleaning for me!!
oh yeah. Sorry, I just saw this msg: I plugged the phone in to charge, right next to me, but the cat lay down on it!
haha no worries. I'm busy cleaning the house. lucky me!!
